title: Oceanic Gaming Network

embed.description: Oceanic Gaming is home to Rusted World and Oceanic ARK!

body:
Hey everyone,
I am looking to expand our league community to make an amazing league environment for players. We have an already substantial discord in which there is a dedicated league sector for finding players for games, private voice channels, posting memes and finding new friends and if we can get enough people I would love to make tournaments for IRL prizes and prizes from Riot. I would love to make some teams to take place in tournaments but you can find out more information once you join :) Thanks for taking the time to read this and I hope to see you in our discord or to join you on Summoners Rift.

[]( https://discord.gg/YFKvzmY )[](https://discordapp.com/invite/SeKXTQq)

replies.body:
Yo this seems cool! You should post in team recruitment as well I think it gets a lot of traffic for these types of things. :)

Edit: Thought i'd just put the discord link here for all wanted to quickly check in :) https://discord.gg/qtkj57T
